question: Which company has manufactured and delivered the booster segment for Gaganyaan Launch Vehicle?
explanation:
The construction major Larsen & Toubro (L&T) has manufactured and delivered the booster segment for Gaganyaan Launch Vehicle to ISRO.
The delivered component is the middle segment of the rocket booster named as S-200. The component has been manufactured at the companyâ€™s Powai Aerospace Manufacturing Facility and has been delivered to ISRO ahead of its schedule.
